data.title: Situation Report Number
data.definition: Identifies the report from which the data for the incident was taken.

data.title: Enemy Killed in Action
data.definition: Confirmed count of enemy killed in action.

data.title: Enemy Wounded in Action
data.definition: Confirmed count of enemy wounded in action.

data.title: Enemy Prisoners of War
data.definition: Confirmed count of enemy prisoners of war.

data.title: Quarter of Year
data.definition: Identifies the quarter of the year in which the incident took place.

data.title: Special Geographic Division Indicator
data.definition: This field, when used, indicates any special geographic division, e.g., ARVN divisional area of operation.

data.title: Country Indicator
data.definition: Identifies the country in which the incident occurred.

data.title: Province
data.definition: Identifies the province in which the incident occurred.

data.title: VC Military Region
data.definition: Identifies the Viet Cong Military region in which the incident occurred.

data.title: Corps Area
data.definition: Identifies the corps tactical zone in which the incident occurred.

data.title: Map Coordinates UTM
data.definition: An eight-character UTM coordinate in the form AAEEENNN gives location of incident, where AA is the alphabetic assignment for the specific UTM grid, EEE is the numeric easting direction, and NNN is the numeric northing direction in the area.

data.title: Date Incident Initiated
data.definition: Identifies the calendar date of the incident.

data.title: Time Incident Initiated
data.definition: Indicates local (Saigon) time incident was initiated.
